column4: welp, id be able to burn an ubuntu cd while using a live windows xp cd, but I only have one cd drive in my computer; and 5 exrta cd drives sitting around; I tried every one of them and for some reason my computer compeltely ignores every cd drive I attach to it except the one it has now
did you "pin" the drive(s) as master/slave properly?
the main reason it's to recommended to use 3rd party drivers is they aren't supported
i really don't recommend you continue, BUT a *.run is something you make executable and "run"
